ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:LocalityText: Indonesia, West Papua, Hoa Creek, Teminabuan region, Kepala Burung (Vogelkop) Peninsula

ncrsDetermination.abcd:FullScientificNameString: Limoniethoudende breccie opvulling in de zoogen. "Alten Mann"
